post.description: Auto-detects a document's type information; does not require file extension.  Analyzes file contents to confirm file type.  Even if no file extension is present, the auto-detect system will reliably analyze the contents of the file and identify its file type.  Supports over 100 image file formats, Office document file formats, PDF, and more.

post.description: Creates an HTML embed code for a simple web-based viewer of a document; supports Office document types and PDF.

parameters.name: inputFile
parameters.description: Input file to perform the operation on.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Input file to perform the operation on.

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

DetectedFileExtension.description: Detected file extension of the file format, with a leading period

DetectedMimeType.description: MIME type of this file extension

AlternateFileTypeCandidates.description: Alternate file type options and their probability

Probability.description: Probability that this extension is the right one; possible values are between 0.0 (lowest confidence) and 1.0 (highest confidence)

DetectedFileExtension.description: Detected file extension of the file format, with a leading period

DetectedMimeType.description: MIME type of this file extension

MultipageImageFormatConversionResult.description: Result of converting a multi-page image into individual pages with a different format

PageCount.description: The number of pages in the converted output

Filename.description: File name of the image in the converted file format

FileBytes.description: File bytes (contents) of the image in converted file format

GetImageInfoResult.description: Result of running a get-info operation on an image

Width.description: Width in pixels of the image

Height.description: Height in pixels of the image

CompressionLevel.description: Compression level value from 0 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality)

ImageHashSignature.description: SHA256 hash signature of the image

HasTransparency.description: True if the image contains transparency, otherwise false

MimeType.description: MIME type of the image format

DPIUnit.description: Units of the DPI measurement; can be either in Inches or Centimeters

DPI.description: DPI (pixels per unit, e.g. pixels per inch) of the image

ExifProfileName.description: Name of the EXIF profile used

ExifValues.description: EXIF tags and values embedded in the image

Tag.description: Tag name for the EXIF value

DataType.description: Date type of the EXIF value

DataValue.description: Value, formatted as a string of the EXIF value

HtmlTemplate.description: HTML template input as a string

Operations.description: Operations to apply to this template

Action.description: Operation action to take; possible values are "Replace"

MatchAgsint.description: For Replace operations, the string to match against (to be replaced with ReplaceWith string)

ReplaceWith.description: For Replace operations, the string to Replace the original string with

HtmlTemplateApplicationResponse.description: Response from an HTML template application

Successful.description: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

FinalHtml.description: Final HTML result of all operations on input

Url.description: URL address of the website to screenshot.  HTTP and HTTPS are both supported, as are custom ports.

ExtraLoadingWait.description: Optional: Additional number of milliseconds to wait once the web page has finished loading before taking the screenshot.  Can be helpful for highly asynchronous websites.  Provide a value of 0 for the default of 5000 milliseconds (5 seconds)

ScreenshotWidth.description: Optional: Width of the screenshot in pixels; supply 0 to default to 1280 x 1024, supply -1 to measure the full screen height of the page and attempt to take a screen-height screenshot

ScreenshotHeight.description: Optional: Height of the screenshot in pixels; supply 0 to default to 1280 x 1024, supply -1 to measure the full screen height of the page and attempt to take a screen-height screenshot

HtmlToPdfRequest.description: Details of the HTML to PDF request

ExtraLoadingWait.description: Optional: Additional number of milliseconds to wait once the web page has finished loading before taking the screenshot.  Can be helpful for highly asynchronous websites.

HtmlToOfficeRequest.description: Details of the HTML to Office request

Html.description: HTML to render to Office format
